items.name: Matar & Kulcha
items.description: Matar cholle or white pea curry is perhaps one of the most popular north indian or delhi street food curry. Served with plain kulcha + picked onions.

items.name: Lamb do Pyaza
items.description: Tender juicy lamb pieces cooked in flavourful gravy with petals of onion and tomato with other spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha or rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Ragada Pattice
items.description: Mashed potato patty fried for a crispy skin and served with green pea churry smeared with tangy, sweet and spicy chutney

items.name: Veg Paratha
items.description: Mix veggies mixed with spices and stuffed in whole wheat dough, flattened  and cooked on a pan. Served with a side of onion tomato chutney. (2 parathas)

items.name: Goan Khatkhate
items.description: A comforting spiced vegetarian dish cooked with lentils, coconut, spices and kokum
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Goan Ross Omlette
items.description: A comfoting food from Goa.  Goan chicken curry cooked with coconut, garlic, onion and home made spice mix and topped with an omelette and fresh coriander. Served with 2 pav.

items.name: Sweet Potato Tikki
items.description: Spiced sweet potato patty shallow fried and served with spicy green chutney. (4 tikkis)

items.name: Oats-Rava Idli
items.description: Steamed cakes made of oats and semolina (granulated wheat) mixed with yogurt, onion, cashew and chilles. Served with coconut chutney.

items.name: Amritsari Nutri Kulcha
items.description: Street style soya chunk curry cooked in a base of spicy and tangy onion, tomato, fresh spices and soya granules. Served with 2 kulchas + pickled onion + achar

items.name: Punjabi Chicken Curry
items.description: Chicken curry cooked with onion, tomato, ginger garlic and fresh ground punjabi spice mix, topped with fresh coriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha or rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Cheese Corn Balls
items.description: Boiled potatoes mixed with cheese, paneer and green chillies coated with breadbrumbs and deep fried. Served with side of tomato ketchup. (6 pieces)

items.name: Chicken Tehari
items.description: One pot chicken rice cooked with caramalised onion, tomato, ginger garlic paste and fresh garam masala

items.name: Channe Ghasi
items.description: A flavourful coconut based thick chickpea curry prepared with a flavourful blend of spices. A famous mangalorean dish
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kori Ghassi
items.description: Manglorean chicken curry with curry leaves, spices and coconut milk
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha or rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Dabeli
items.description: A snack from the streets of India, with mashed potatoes cooked with tangy and spicy sauces and freahly made dabeli masala stuffed between a bun and smeered with roasted peanuts, sev, pomagranate seeds. (2 dabeli)

items.name: Dhaba Style Dal Kichidi
items.description: Rice lentils, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic & chilli pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices for the flavourful taste. Served with papad. A complete comfort meal.

items.name: Cheese Corn Balls Makhni
items.description: Cheese corn balls cooked in a thick buttery and glossy gravy made of onion, tomato, garlic and cashew nut topped with some fresh cream and coriander
items.extra: make it a meal with parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Maharashtrian Chicken Thali
items.description: A non-veg feast from the state of Maharashtra. 3 chicken dishes, one refreshing drink, koshimbir (spiced side salad), achar, papad, 2 chapati, rice.

items.name: Sabudana Vada
items.description: A popular snack made with soaked sago peals mixed with boiled potatoes, cumin seeds and green chillies and shallow fried. Served with sweetened yogurt. (2 vada)

items.name: Pav Bhaji
items.description: Mix of different veggies boiled and cooked in a spicy flavourful gravy of onion, tomato and fresh pav bhaji masala topped with butter and fresh corriander served with 2 buns

items.name: Kadhai Paneer
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in flavourful gravy with onion, tomato puree, fresh fragrant spices topped with petals of onion, capsicum and fresh coriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Punjabi Tariwala Murgh
items.description: A simple chicken curry with hearty and warm spices, ginger, coriander and turmeric
items.extra: make it a meal with rice/paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sindhi Aloo Tuk
items.description: Crispy fried potatoes topped with a special spice mix and tossed together for a even coat

items.name: Besan Ka Cheela
items.description: Chickpea flour mixed with spices, onion, tomato and chilles and made into thick batter and cooked like a pancake. Served with tomato onion chutney on the side.

items.name: Chanar Dhalna
items.description: A simple delicious bengali recipe made with cottage cheese balls and potatoes cooked with spice mix and ginger paste
items.extra: make it a meal with rice/paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chingri Macher Jhol
items.description: Bengali style prawns curry where plump juicy shrimp is cooked in thick coconut milk and warm bengali garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + papad + side salad + achar

items.name: Hara Bhara Kebab
items.description: Patty made with spinach, boiled potatoes, green peas and spices, shallow fried for a crispy outer layer. Served with spicy green chutney. (4 kebabs)

items.name: Palak Lasun Dal Kichdi
items.description: Spinach, garlic, lentils, onion and spices cooked together in a pressure cooker and then tempered with cumin seeds, garlic and onions.

items.name: Pachakari Korma
items.description: Mildly spicy kerala style vegetable curry cooked in coconut and cashew based gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + papad + side salad + achar

items.name: Kararu Lamb Salna
items.description: Tender lamb shoulder cooked in thick aromatic broth with warm spices and coconut
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chundal
items.description: Boiled chickpeas sauted and tempered with fresh coconut, spices and curry leaves

items.name: Lemon Rice
items.description: Rice, cashews, chillies and other spices stir fried together and mixed with lime juice. Served with achar and papad

items.name: Veg Hakka Noodles
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish with assorted veggies cooked with chinese sauces and noodles
items.extra: make it special with some veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Hakka Noodles
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish with assorted veggies and chicken cooked with chinese sauces and noodles.
items.extra: make it special with some chicken manchurian gravy

items.name: Sev Puri Chaat
items.description: Street food of India where small fried disk is topped with boiled potato, tangy sweet tamarind chutney, sev, spicy green chutney, fresh corriander and chaat masala. (6 puris)

items.name: Sambar Rice
items.description: A comfort meal from the south of India. Lentils and veggies cooked together with tamarind, and freshly made sambar masala tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves. Served with rice + papad

items.name: Aloo-Chana Achari Pulao
items.description: Potato & chickpeas cooked in pickling spices and layered with fragrant basmati rice, caramalised onion, mint and coriander. Served with a side of yogurt raita + papad

items.name: Chettinad Chicken Biryani
items.description: An amazing biryani from Kerala made with a meledy of unique spices cooked with juicy chicken and fragrant basmati rice with freshly ground Chettinad spice paste and caramalised onions. Served with yogurt raita + achar + papad

items.name: Vada Pav
items.description: A famous veggie burger from the streets of Mumbai. The patty is made of boiled potatoes mixed with spices, coated in chickpea flour and fried to perfection. This is stuffed in a bun smeared with spicy green chutney and dry garlic chutney. (2 vada pav)

items.name: Kheema Pav
items.description: Minced chicken cooked with onions, tomato, green peas and spices topped with fresh garam masala and coriander for the zing. Served with 2 buns and green chutney
